channel.title: Robert F Kennedy Jr on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Robert F Kennedy Jr on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Meet the latest anti-vaccine voices on RFK Jr.’s CDC advisory panel
item.description: The panel will meet this week and could limit access to measles, Hep B, COVID vaccines.

item.title: Ousted CDC director to testify before Senate after RFK Jr. called her a liar
item.description: Monarez said she was fired for not pre-approving vaccine recommendations from a dubious panel.

item.title: Who can get a COVID vaccine—and how? It’s complicated.
item.description: We’re working with a patchwork system, and there are a lot of gray areas.

item.title: RFK Jr. says COVID shots still available to all as cancer patients denied access
item.description: RFK Jr. accused senators of making things up as they made factual points on vaccines.

item.title: OTC nasal spray seemed to cut COVID infections by 67% in mid-sized trial
item.description: The Phase 2 trial is not definitive, but it comes as vaccine access is severely restricted.

item.title: CDC director has been ousted just weeks after Senate confirmation
item.description: Monarez aligned with evidence-based public health community and had support of experts.

item.title: CDC director has been ousted just weeks after Senate confirmation
item.description: Monarez aligned with evidence-based public health community and had support of experts.

item.title: Top pediatricians buck RFK Jr.’s anti-vaccine meddling on COVID shot guidance
item.description: The American Academy of Pediatrics recommends children under age 2 get vaccinated.

item.title: RFK Jr.’s Wi-Fi and 5G conspiracies appear to make it into MAHA report draft
item.description: The “Make Our Children Healthy Again Strategy” draft doesn’t mention top killers of kids.

item.title: Anti-vaccine RFK Jr. creates vaccine panel of anti-vaccine group’s dreams
item.description: With new vaccine panel, fears rise RFK Jr. will upend childhood shots.

item.title: Under RFK Jr, CDC skips study on vaccination rates, quietly posts data on drop
item.description: Vaccination rates fell once again as nonmedical exemptions hit a new high.

item.title: Trump admin. is muffling CDC’s flagship health journal, report finds
item.description: CDC’s MMWR is publishing much less, and sources say studies now require RFK Jr.’s sign-off.

item.title: RFK Jr. wants to change program that stopped vaccine makers from leaving US market
item.description: RFK Jr. is targeting a little-known program that underpins childhood immunizations in the US.

item.title: Large study squashes anti-vaccine talking points about aluminum
item.description: RFK Jr. has falsely called aluminum adjuvants “extremely neurotoxic.”

item.title: RFK Jr. may be about to demolish preventive health panel, health groups fear
item.description: The fear is that the USPSTF will go the same way as the CDC’s vaccine advisory panel.
